column17: Jockey Cotton Knit Shorts Dress up comfy in these stretchable knit shorts from Jockey. The knee length shorts with elasticated waist and draw string come in soft fabric with great back fitting to ensure utmost comfort to the wearer. The contrasting vertical piping towards the sides and a lone Jockey Logo near the knees make it a stylish sportswear. Material: Cotton Size: This brand runs true to size. To ensure the best fit we suggest consulting the size chart. Model is Wearing Size SCotton
